template.vue:
<template>
    <v-card style="width: 350px;">
        <v-card-title>
            <v-icon left>
                mdi-code-string
            </v-icon>
            String
            <v-spacer/>
            <v-switch label="Multiline" v-model="multiline"/>
        </v-card-title>
        <v-card-text>
            <component :is="stringComp" v-model="node.data"/>
        </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    props: {
        node: Object,
        state: Object,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            multiline: false,
        };
    },
    computed: {
        stringComp() {
            return this.multiline ? "v-textarea" : "v-text-field";
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.multiline = this.node.data.indexOf("\n") !== -1;
    }
}
</script>
